tidbits.title: Unique Wildlife
tidbits.description: Australia is home to unique wildlife like kangaroos, koalas, and the iconic duck-billed platypus, found nowhere else in the world.

tidbits.title: Vast Outback
tidbits.description: The Australian Outback covers a vast expanse of the country, characterized by arid landscapes, ancient rock formations like Uluru, and a rich Indigenous cultural heritage.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: From the Great Barrier Reef to the rugged landscapes of the Blue Mountains and the bustling cities like Sydney and Melbourne, Australia offers a diverse range of landscapes and experiences.
